name: Occupy White Walls
storyline:
In Occupy White Walls, you can create a museum and curate its contents. Construct a space, fill it with art that is personal to you, and open its doors to welcome the world! OWW is powered by a first-of-its-kind art discovery AI called DAISY and has a fun, creative, and grown-up player community. (just don’t call it ‘Hipster Minecraft’ )

Key Features
- Build a gallery (or a museum) in a creative sandbox environment with over 2,200 unique assets. There is no limit to your creativity
- DAISY, a groundbreaking art curation AI helps you discover art you never knew you'd like without needing any prior art knowledge
- MAISY, an AI that helps you find similar artworks
- Curation Enigmas! - Conjure, or solve, art-based enigmas hidden in galleries!
- A grownup community with entertaining and inspiring personalities
- Collaborative building - Build with friends (or strangers)
- Discover artworks from historical masters like Monet to artworks from a vast array of contemporary artists from an ever-growing database of over 6,000 artworks
- Pixel art galore - Get creative and create custom art with interactive mosaics
- Visit the Plaza and see what strange new assets Larry and Peggy offer daily
- Explore tens of thousands of inspiring spaces created by players and visit any you’d fancy
summary: To say it’s a PC sandbox-building, AI-driven MMO where people play with Art, developed by folks who really love architecture and abstract characters… would be a bit of a mouthful.
